metadata.author: Pan Junping; Feng Cailian; Mao Qinxiang; Qiang Jun; Wu Jing; Kong Jiaofeng; Chen Yuchen; Zhang Jie; Xian Xinyuan
metadata.title: Novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19) CT distribution and sign features

introduction: COVID-19 imaging characteristic mainly has subpleural, centrilobular and diffused distribution. The first two distributions can overlap or progress to diffused distribution. In the later period, it was mainly manifested as organizing pneumonia and fibrosis. The most valuable characteristic is the pleural parallel sign.

summary: COVID-19 imaging characteristic mainly has subpleural, centrilobular and diffused distribution.
The first two distributions can overlap or progress to diffused distribution.
It was mainly manifested as organizing pneumonia and fibrosis.
The most valuable characteristic is the pleural parallel sign.
